name: none
detail: none

name: Brew of superior DMG
detail: Drink to gain +4 Dmg to your next damage roll.

name: Brew of superior DEF
detail: Drink to gain +4 Def on a monsters next damage roll.

name: Brew of superior STR
detail: Drink to gain +15 Str to your next d100 dice roll.

name: Brew of superior DEX
detail: Drink to gain +15 Dex to your next d100 dice roll.

name: Brew of superior INT
detail: Drink to gain +15 Int to your next d100 dice roll.

name: Objective item
detail: An “Objective Item” is found that may be required for a quest (check the current quest’s details). If it’s not needed for the quest, it is instead a “superior Item” worth 250gp.

name: Gemstones
detail: A small bag filled with valuable gemstones.

name: superior armour
detail: Roll on table A – Armour and add “superior” before its name, it gains +0.6 Def.

name: superior weapon
detail: Roll on table W – Weapon and add “superior” before its name, add +3 to its Dmg.

name: Potion of superior remove poison
detail: Drink to remove up to 8 shaded pips on the poison track.

name: Potion of superior healing
detail: Drink to restore up to 16 lost HP.

name: Potion of superior STR
detail: Drink to gain +15 Str until you next shade a Â on the time track.

name: Potion of superior DEX
detail: Drink to gain +15 Dex until you next shade a Â on the time track.

name: Potion of superior INT
detail: Drink to gain +15 Int until you next shade a Â on the time track.

name: Potion of superior cure disease
detail: Drink to remove up to 8 shaded pips on the disease track.

name: Gemstones
detail: A small bag filled with valuable gemstones.

name: Elixir of superior fate
detail: Drink to gain 3 fate points.

name: Gemstones
detail: A small bag filled with valuable gemstones.

name: Elixir of superior health
detail: Drink to gain 3 point of primary HP.

name: Elixir of superior STR
detail: Drink to gain 5 points of primary Str.

name: Elixir of superior DEX
detail: Drink to gain 5 points of primary Dex.

name: Elixir of superior INT
detail: Drink to gain 5 points of primary Int.

name: Spell book
detail: Roll twice on table S – Spells and add the results to the spell book.

name: Potion of superior fate
detail: Drink to add +80 to a result when rolling on the next table.

name: Elixir of life
detail: Drink to gain 5 Life points.

name: Legendary ring
detail: Roll on table L for its legend (ring slot) and value.

name: Legendary necklace
detail: Roll on table L for its legend (neck slot) and value.

name: Legendary weapon
detail: Roll on table W for a weapon and then on table L for its legend and value.

name: Legendary armour
detail: Roll on table A for armour and then on table L for its legend and value.
